. In total, we received only about a third of what we requested. The number of basic surgical and face masks we received exceeded our request, and the number of gloves came close to what we asked - but for all other items, we received far less than we requested.

When we are near people, there are two things we must always do: wear a face covering over our nose and mouth and keep at least 6 feet away. Itâ€™s okay to stand further away, like 10 feet or 15 feet. Standing too close should feel uncomfortable or risky, because it is a risk.

There are several ways to make a face covering. You can use a variety of cloth materials, such as bandanas, scarves, t-shirts, sweatshirts, or towels. Just as long as it covers your nose and your mouth, it will help limit the spread of the virus.

Q. How do I safely remove my cloth face covering? 

A. Remove your face covering carefully and do not touch your eyes, nose, and mouth. Wash your hands immediately.

When we are near people, there are two things we must always do: wear a face covering over our nose and mouth and keep at least 6 feet away. Itâ€™s okay to stand further away, like 10 feet or 15 feet. Standing too close should feel uncomfortable or risky, because it is a risk.

There are several ways to make a face covering. You can use a variety of cloth materials, such as bandanas, scarves, t-shirts, sweatshirts, or towels. Just as long as it covers your nose and your mouth, it will help limit the spread of the virus.

Q. How do I safely remove my cloth face covering? 

A. Remove your face covering carefully and do not touch your eyes, nose, and mouth. Wash your hands immediately.
